name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Xinyan, equip this card.
After Xinyan equips this card, immediately use Dance on Fire.
When Xinyan, who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: If you have no more than 1 card in your Hand, deal +2 DMG. (Once per Round)
(You must have Xinyan in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
